attributes.action: send repeat convicts to join the armed forces rather than clog up our jails
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why not operate a 3 strikes and you're out policy whereby repeat offenders are forced to join the armed forces rather than just clog up our jails! this would solve at least 2 problems,the overcrowding issue we have in our jails,and the lack of new recruits into the army etc. this would also work as a kind of boot camp to these leeches of society!
